review: It was nice while it worked. We have a smart tv so this wasn't super necessary but it was better than the built in software on the tv. I would rate it higher but at one point it did an "update" which never finished. This completely ruined the Chromecast as I haven't been able to use it since. We've tried factory resetting it but I think the software on it is hosed. Maybe I'll get a 2nd one someday but for now we'll just stick with the crappier built in smart tv functionality.
